value.title: StarCraft 2: Has' AMAZING Eco Cheese vs ByuN! (Best-of-3)
value.excerpt: Best-of-3 series of StarCraft 2 between Has (Protoss) and ByuN (Terran). In this series Has decides to do Has things, as he focuses on an insane Protoss economy, going toe to toe versus ByuN in macro games. I guess we can call this economy cheese?
